function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of self-isolation measures for individuals with cough or fever symptoms","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Encourage individuals to self-isolate and seek medical advice","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Individuals with cough or fever symptoms","Owner":"Health authorities, employers, individuals"},{"Description":"Impact of interventions on contagious disease spread","Impact":"Potential increase in infections and deaths if interventions are not effective","Mitigation":"Implement effective and timely interventions based on data and analysis","Technologies":"Data analysis, modeling, public health measures","People":"Government, public health authorities, healthcare systems","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, healthcare systems"}]}
